Question & Options:
How does the background score relate to the vacuum of space in the context of the film?
Options:
A. A) It creates a sense of chaos.
B. B) It enhances the silence experienced in the vacuum of space.
C. C) It is not relevant to the vacuum of space.
D. D) It represents the absence of sound.
Correct Answer: B) It enhances the silence experienced in the vacuum of space.
